com.ontotext.s4.service

Class Annotation

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ontotext.s4.service.Annotation

  • public class Annotation
extends Object
    Representation of a single annotation from an annotated document returned by the S4 online API.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Annotation(long[] indices)
      Used by Jackson to decode the "indices" property of the JSON response into start and end offsets.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addFeature(String name, Object value)
      Catch-all setter used by Jackson to gather other properties from the JSON response into the features map.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Annotation

        public Annotation(long[] indices)
        Used by Jackson to decode the "indices" property of the JSON response into start and end offsets.
        Parameters:
        indices - a two-element array containing the start and end offsets, in that order.
